DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare clinical radiological outcome mobile-bearing fixed-bearing total knee arthroplasty .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Outcomes Mobile Fixed-bearing Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Double blind , randomize prospective study Mobile fix bear company - Mobile bear group : group M - Fixed bear group : group F Inclusion criterion - patient expect primary total knee arthroplasty without severe deformity Clinical outcomes - Range motion - Complication - Scorings - KSS , KSFS , HSS score , WOMAC score , Oxford score , SF-36 Radiological outcomes - Alignment angle knee - Positions femoral tibial component - Position patella - Radiolucency
DOC.criteria: primary total knee arthroplasty infection severe deformity knee revision
